name: AngularJS
description: Angular is a development platform for building mobile and desktop web applications
summary: Angular is a development platform for creating applications using modern web standards. Angular includes a wealth of essential features such as mobile gestures, animations, filtering, routing, data binding, security, internationalization, and beautiful UI components. It's extremely modular, lightweight, and easy to learn.
scenario: When I want to create reausable and extendible javascript components
When I want to create complex single page web apps
When I want to create mobile web apps using web technologies
